title: Just Dance Greatest Hits
description: Shake it up with the greatest songs and the hottest moves from the Just Dance® franchise! Just Dance Greatest Hits includes all the most popular tracks from Just Dance and Just Dance 2, plus bonus songs from Just Dance 3! Start the party, battle with friends, or even exercise in disguise to hit songs from Katy Perry, Rihanna, Beastie Boys, and Ke$ha – 35 tracks in all! For the first time for Kinect™ for Xbox 360®, Just Dance Greatest Hits offers players the chance to dance along with classic hits from Just Dance and Just Dance 2. Just Dance Greatest Hits is the ultimate way to discover – or rediscover – America’s best-selling dance game brand.
